casebody.data:
Nathaniel Ray McLEAN
v.
HARNETT COUNTY DISTRICT COURT Jacqualyn L. Lee. No. 429P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Nathaniel Ray McLean, for McLean, Nathaniel Ray. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Harnett County District Court. Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney.

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 22nd of December 2015 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Harnett County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
